description.content:
requests to the data and login api shoud be secured.
1. not registered devices are permited to read/write data for 180 sec (configurable), register as unknow after timeout
2. only registered devices are permited to read/write data for a individual period
3. grants to users are configurable and get disabled after individual timeout

Time to load the map and moving on the map is slow and lead to crashes.
(maybe hide maps on load by default?)

testing.title: loading time and smooth scrolling on Samsung Android devices

description.content: Dialog stays zoomed after focusout on input, select, textarea.
